title: File transfer failed after connecting successfully via Bluetooth
answer:
l   File transfers will be unsuccessful if the devices go out of range (10 m). Try again after bringing the devices within range.

l   When sending files to another Bluetooth device, the file transfer will be terminated if the other device does not respond for a long time. After sending files, please remind the receiver to accept the file transfer request.

l   Files will not be sent if they are not supported by the receiving device. Please verify file types supported by the receiving device before sending files.
keywords: Bluetooth, transfer files, send files, receive files
